description: Default credit system parameters implementing section 10

caps_and_limits.comment: C_max: per-human soft cap, I_max: 5% of population per epoch, S_max: 80% of I_max

earning_multipliers.comment: beta0: base multiplier, beta1: proximity bonus, theta: scarcity midpoint

spend_costs.comment: Credits required for different escalation levels

quorum_rules.comment: alpha: participation rate, q: path diversity, tau: approval threshold

escalation_weights.comment: gamma: impact/need/diversity weights, Theta_esc: escalation trigger

neighbor_selection.comment: lambda: connectedness/scarcity/load weights, max neighbors to invite

decay_parameters.comment: H_c: credit half-life in days, delta: decay base for exponential decay

action_base_awards.comment: Base credit awards for different types of care labor

credit_amounts.comment: Credit amounts must be non-negative with 2 decimal places

rates_and_factors.comment: Rates and factors must be in [0,1] range

tuning_guidelines.conservative_start: Begin with these defaults and adjust based on observed behavior

adjustment_triggers.increase_base_awards: If overall activity is too low

anti_abuse_measures.comment: Hard limits to prevent gaming and spam
